attributes.title: Best Office EVER!
attributes.caption: The gang moves into their new dream office! What could possibly go wrong?
attributes.description: The gang moves into their new dream office! What could possibly go wrong?

attributes.title: Introducing C-Mail
attributes.caption: E-mail for the company is down and there's only one solution... Make Chris do it.
attributes.description: E-mail for the company is down and there's only one solution... Make Chris do it.

attributes.title: Cheating DEATH
attributes.caption: Barbara has a premonition that Death is coming for everyone Final Destination style
attributes.description: Barbara has a premonition that Death is coming for everyone Final Destination style. Can everyone survive?

attributes.title: Surprise Background Check
attributes.caption: Barb's background check finally comes in and Burnie isn't happy about it.
attributes.description: Barb's background check finally comes in and Burnie isn't happy about it.

attributes.title: Stolen Identity
attributes.caption: With people renting their cars and homes to strangers, it was only a matter of time before Chris took it too far.
attributes.description: With people renting their cars and homes to strangers, it was only a matter of time before Chris took it too far.

attributes.title: Millennial's Worst Nightmare!
attributes.caption: Everyone is feeling their age after conversations with Christina the Gen Z baby.
attributes.description: Everyone is feeling their age after conversations with Christina the Gen Z baby.

attributes.title: Something's Wrong with Chris
attributes.caption: Burnie notices that something's off about Chris and decides to get to the bottom of it!
attributes.description: Burnie notices that something's off about Chris and decides to get to the bottom of it!

attributes.title: Invasion of Privacy
attributes.caption: Since the acquisition, Burnie has become increasingly paranoid that his employees are plotting against him and he has a plan to find out for sure.
attributes.description: Since the acquisition, Burnie has become increasingly paranoid that his employees are plotting against him and he has a plan to find out for sure.

attributes.title: The 16 Year Lie!
attributes.caption: Burnie has been hiding a dark and terrible secret for the past 16 years.
attributes.description: Burnie has been hiding a dark and terrible secret for the past 16 years.

attributes.title: Office Sh*t Talking
attributes.caption: What started as a normal meeting turns into an office showdown when everyone starts to realize that the second they leave, their co-workers are going to talk shit behind their backs.
attributes.description: What started as a normal meeting turns into an office showdown when everyone starts to realize that the second they leave, their co-workers are going to talk shit behind their backs.

attributes.title: Stealing on the Job
attributes.caption: Burnie, Barbara and Chad hold an intervention for Max and his kleptomania.
attributes.description: Burnie, Barbara and Chad hold an intervention for Max and his kleptomania.

attributes.title: Secret Office Drama
attributes.caption: Blaine shows Christina the drama that hides behind the closed doors of Rooster Teeth.
attributes.description: Blaine shows Christina the drama that hides behind the closed doors of Rooster Teeth.

attributes.title: How to Stop Spam Calls!
attributes.caption: Chad's tired of getting spam calls so he decides to do something about it
attributes.description: Chad's tired of getting spam calls so he decides to do something about it.

attributes.title: Worst Self Defense Class Ever!
attributes.caption: Burnie brings in a self-defense instructor to teach the gang how to protect themselves. But who will protect the instructor from the staff?
attributes.description: Burnie brings in a self-defense instructor to teach the gang how to protect themselves. But who will protect the instructor from the staff?

attributes.title: It's Just Allergies
attributes.caption: Don't worry it's just allergies.
attributes.description: Everyone seems to be under the weather and Burnie is trying desperately not to get sick.

attributes.title: The Ultimate Heist
attributes.caption: When Burnie takes the office Xbox, the gang recruits an elite team to help get it back.
attributes.description: When Burnie takes the office Xbox, the gang recruits an elite team to help get it back.

attributes.title: Revenge Dating
attributes.caption: Blaine has a new girlfriend and Chris is NOT OK with it.
attributes.description: Blaine has a new girlfriend and Chris is NOT OK with it.

attributes.title: Bloopers & Outtakes
attributes.caption: We've had a lot of fun making the latest RT Shorts! Here's a compilation of mess ups, accidents and alt lines for your enjoyment.
attributes.description: We've had a lot of fun making the latest RT Shorts! Here's a compilation of mess ups, accidents and alt lines for your enjoyment.

attributes.title: The Raid on Area 51
attributes.caption: In this riveting documentary, survivors of the raid on Area 51 give a first hand account on what really took place that day.
attributes.description: In this riveting documentary, survivors of the raid on Area 51 give a first hand account on what really took place that day.

attributes.title: Silly Surgery Scam
attributes.caption: Burnie changes the company health insurance to cover an expensive surgery and hopes no one in the office will notice.
attributes.description: Burnie changes the company health insurance to cover an expensive surgery and hopes no one in the office will notice.

attributes.title: Period Problems
attributes.caption: Barbara, Mariel and Jessica confront Burnie about getting feminine products stocked in the office.
attributes.description: Barbara, Mariel and Jessica confront Burnie about getting feminine products stocked in the office.

attributes.title: Amazon in Space
attributes.caption: With all of Earth's problems, the incredibly wealthy hold a press conference to announce their solution.
attributes.description: With all of Earth's problems, the incredibly wealthy hold a press conference to announce their solution.

attributes.title: Short on Cash
attributes.caption: Things really go downhill when Chris loses the entire department's budget at the horse track.
attributes.description: Things really go downhill when Chris loses the entire department's budget at the horse track.

attributes.title: If Your Office was an RPG
attributes.caption: What if a day at the office was a video game?
attributes.description: What if a day at the office was a video game?
attributes.display_title: If Your Office was an RPG

attributes.title: The Ultimate CBD Product
attributes.caption: With CBD sweeping the nation it was only a matter of time before it made it to a new market.
attributes.description: With CBD sweeping the nation it was only a matter of time before it made it to a new market.

attributes.title: If a Bot Wrote RT Shorts
attributes.caption: We forced a bot to watch every RT short this year and this is what it came up with.
attributes.description: We forced a bot to watch every RT short this year and this is what it came up with.
attributes.display_title: If a Bot Wrote RT Shorts

attributes.title: Magic: The Reckoning!
attributes.caption: Thanks to Wizards of the Coast for sponsoring this video! Download Magic: The Gathering Arena at http://bit.ly/2lqbGRg for free today! When our HR team refuses to get involved, office disputes must be settled in Magic: The Gathering!
attributes.description:

When our HR team refuses to get involved, office disputes must be settled in Magic: The Gathering!

attributes.title: You've Been Warned
attributes.caption: In every horror movie, there's always a creepy old man who warns the would be victims. But who warns the warners?
attributes.description: In every horror movie, there's always a creepy old man who warns the would be victims. But who warns the warners?

attributes.title: Real Horror
attributes.caption: A masked slasher is lose in the office, but is he really the thing to fear?
attributes.description: A masked slasher is lose in the office, but is he really the thing to fear?

attributes.title: Hail Clayton!
attributes.caption: Satan's brother Clayton wants to start a podcast in hell, so he travels to Rooster Teeth to pick up some tips and equipment!
attributes.description:
Satan's brother Clayton wants to start a podcast in hell, so he travels to Rooster Teeth to pick up some tips and equipment!
Check out the all NEW podcast Good Morning From Hell here: http://bit.ly/2MolNRv

attributes.title: Haunted Tales of Terror

attributes.description: Ghosts, creppy children, dancing clowns? Sit back, lock your doors, and watch our compilation of spooktacular shorts... if you dare

attributes.title: Captain Cringe

attributes.description: The Evil Doctor Destroyer threatens to destroy the freedom force. Can one unlikely hero save the day?

attributes.title: The Baby Yoda Mistake
attributes.caption: How could Disney NOT know everyone was going to fall in love with Baby Yoda?
attributes.description: How could Disney NOT know everyone was going to fall in love with Baby Yoda?

attributes.title: Gift Exchange
attributes.caption: Every year the gang tries to one up each other with gift giving. This year things get really out of hand...
attributes.description: Every year the gang tries to one up each other with gift giving. This year things get really out of hand...

attributes.title: New Year's Kiss
attributes.caption: Realizing the terrible fate that awaits those that don't have someone to kiss on New Year's Eve, Chris takes matters into his own hands
